channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- OpenPages GRC Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- OpenPages GRC Platform

item.title: CVE-2020-4536|2024-08-04T08:07:48.879Z -- ibm -- openpages%20grc%20platform
item.description: IBM OpenPages GRC Platform 8.1 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 182907.

item.title: CVE-2020-4535|2024-08-04T08:07:48.965Z -- ibm -- openpages%20grc%20platform
item.description: IBM OpenPages GRC Platform 8.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 182906.
